case.title: Wild Orchid - 37 (London)
case.text:
Looking for a flower with a soul like yours, A free spirit,so intense and vivid. There were many flowers, The tulips were always telling me to stand up straight and not open up too much. The violets were deep but when watered with love closed up. The rose was too perfect in every aspect. Then there was you so unique and wild. A orchid with a soul different from them all different to touch,to hold,to look at. You took my wild colorful side,and let it live. Set me free with your fire
5.7 , brunette , curvy, 12/14, attracted to tall, white -caucasian, 37-47
